channel.title: CVE Feed for WPPOOL -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPPOOL -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-30437|2024-03-29T17:22:36.216Z -- wppool -- webinar%20and%20video%20conference%20with%20jitsi%20meet
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPPOOL Webinar and Video Conference with Jitsi Meet allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Webinar and Video Conference with Jitsi Meet: from n/a through 2.6.3.
